channel.title: mailcow: dockerized - Blog
channel.description: The mailserver suite with the 'moo' – 🐮 + 🐋 = 💕 | Official Blog Page

item.title: 🌊🐄 Amoogust Update 2022 - The Nightly Build Switch Update | Changes
item.author: Niklas Meyer
item.description: Moohoo everyone! Yeah, a August Update in September… kinda sus if you ask me! This time there are even some changes regarding the Update sources! So stay curious. Let’s start quite gently for the time being: Stable changes (stable branch) OAuth clients and app passwords are now accepted again for Cal/CardDav connections. #4685 by @FreddleSpl0it SOGo has been updated to 5.7.1 (Complete changelog here ) receives in mailcow stack container version: mailcow/sogo:1.
